right.text: No.  Hon, you seem to have no idea how much of a positive effect you can have on people.

left.text: *sighs* Hon, what weight would it have if I did? I would free everyone from the worst thing that can occur to someone: knowing me.
Nope, because day by day people make it how apparent I've made a negative effect.

right.text: No, you aren't. Hon, you have given me some of the best days, the best memories, the best things in my life.

left.text: And the very second I have a bad moment, suddenly everyone runs for cover. I'm a goddamn nuclear bomb.
